verses.verse: And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Send <S%H7971><s%> thou <S%H376>men,<s%> that they may <S%H8446>search<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> <S%H5414>give<s%> unto the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> of every <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers<s%> shall ye <S%H7971>send<s%> <S%H259>a<s%> <S%H376>man,<s%> every <S%H3605>one<s%> a <S%H5387>ruler<s%> among them.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H5921>by<s%> the <S%H6310>commandment<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> them from the <S%H4480>wilderness<s%> <S%H4057><s%> of <S%H6290>Paran:<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1992>those<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> were <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
And <S%H428>these<s%> were their <S%H8034>names:<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben,<s%> <S%H8051>Shammua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2139>Zaccur.<s%>
Of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H8095>Simeon,<s%> <S%H8202>Shaphat<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2753>Hori.<s%>
Of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H3612>Caleb<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3312>Jephunneh.<s%>
Of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H3485>Issachar,<s%> <S%H3008>Igal<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph.<s%>
Of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> <S%H1954>Oshea<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun.<s%>
Of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin,<s%> <S%H6406>Palti<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7505>Raphu.<s%>
Of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H2074>Zebulun,<s%> <S%H1427>Gaddiel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5476>Sodi.<s%>
Of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> namely, of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh,<s%> <S%H1426>Gaddi<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5485>Susi.<s%>
Of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan,<s%> <S%H5988>Ammiel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1582>Gemalli.<s%>
Of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H836>Asher,<s%> <S%H5639>Sethur<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4317>Michael.<s%>
Of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H5321>Naphtali,<s%> <S%H5147>Nahbi<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2058>Vophsi.<s%>
Of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad,<s%> <S%H1345>Geuel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4352>Machi.<s%>

These <S%H428><s%> are the <S%H8034>names<s%> of the <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> to spy <S%H8446>out<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H776>land.<s%> And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H1954>Oshea<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> them to spy <S%H8446>out<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them, Get you <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> way <S%H5045>southward,<s%> and go <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H854>into<s%> the mountain: <S%H2022><s%>

And <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> <S%H1931>it<s%> is; and the <S%H5971>people<s%> that <S%H3427>dwelleth<s%> <S%H5921>therein,<s%> whether <S%H1931>they<s%> be <S%H2389>strong<s%> or <S%H7504>weak,<s%> <S%H4592>few<s%> <S%H518>or<s%> <S%H7227>many;<s%>

And <S%H4100>what<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> is <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H1931>they<s%> <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in whether <S%H1931>it<s%> be <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H518>or<s%> <S%H7451>bad;<s%> and <S%H4100>what<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> they be <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H1931>they<s%> <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H2007>in,<s%> whether in <S%H4264>tents,<s%> <S%H518>or<s%> in <S%H4013>strongholds;<s%>

And <S%H4100>what<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> is, whether <S%H1931>it<s%> be <S%H8082>fat<s%> <S%H518>or<s%> <S%H7330>lean,<s%> whether there <S%H3426>be<s%> <S%H6086>wood<s%> therein, <S%H518>or<s%> <S%H369>not.<s%> And be ye of good <S%H2388>courage,<s%> and <S%H3947>bring<s%> of the <S%H4480>fruit<s%> <S%H6529><s%> of the <S%H776>land.<s%> Now the <S%H3117>time<s%> was the <S%H3117>time<s%> of the <S%H1061>firstripe<s%> <S%H6025>grapes.<s%>

So they went <S%H5927>up,<s%> and <S%H8446>searched<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> from the <S%H4480>wilderness<s%> <S%H4057><s%> of <S%H6790>Zin<s%> <S%H5704>unto<s%> <S%H7340>Rehob,<s%> as men <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H2574>Hamath.<s%>

And they <S%H5927>ascended<s%> by the <S%H5045>south,<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H5704>unto<s%> <S%H2275>Hebron;<s%> <S%H8033>where<s%> <S%H289>Ahiman,<s%> <S%H8344>Sheshai,<s%> and <S%H8526>Talmai,<s%> the <S%H3211>children<s%> of <S%H6061>Anak,<s%> were. (Now <S%H2275>Hebron<s%> was <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H6814>Zoan<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt.)<s%>

And they <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H5704>unto<s%> the <S%H5158>brook<s%> of <S%H812>Eshcol,<s%> and cut <S%H3772>down<s%> from <S%H4480>thence<s%> <S%H8033><s%> a <S%H2156>branch<s%> with <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H811>cluster<s%> of <S%H6025>grapes,<s%> and they <S%H5375>bore<s%> it between <S%H8147>two<s%> upon a <S%H4132>staff;<s%> and they brought <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H7416>pomegranates,<s%> and <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H8384>figs.<s%>

The <S%H4725>place<s%> was <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H5158>brook<s%> <S%H812>Eshcol,<s%> <S%H5921>because<s%> <S%H182><s%> of the cluster of <S%H811>grapes<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> cut <S%H3772>down<s%> from <S%H4480>thence.<s%> <S%H8033><s%>
And they <S%H7725>returned<s%> from <S%H4480>searching<s%> <S%H8446><s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H4480>after<s%> <S%H7093><s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%>

And they <S%H1980>went<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> and <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> and <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H6290>Paran,<s%> to <S%H6946>Kadesh;<s%> and brought <S%H7725>back<s%> <S%H1697>word<s%> unto them, and unto <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation,<s%> and <S%H7200>showed<s%> <S%H853>them<s%> the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of the <S%H776>land.<s%>

And they <S%H5608>told<s%> him, and <S%H559>said,<s%> We <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>whither<s%> thou <S%H7971>sentest<s%> us, and <S%H1571>surely<s%> <S%H1931>it<s%> <S%H2100>floweth<s%> with <S%H2461>milk<s%> and <S%H1706>honey;<s%> and <S%H2088>this<s%> is the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of it.

Nevertheless <S%H657><s%> <S%H3588><s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> be <S%H5794>strong<s%> that <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in the <S%H776>land,<s%> and the <S%H5892>cities<s%> are <S%H1219>walled,<s%> and <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H1419>great:<s%> and <S%H1571>moreover<s%> we <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H3211>children<s%> of <S%H6061>Anak<s%> <S%H8033>there.<s%>

The <S%H6003>Amalekites<s%> <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H5045>south:<s%> and the <S%H2850>Hittites,<s%> and the <S%H2983>Jebusites,<s%> and the <S%H567>Amorites,<s%> <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in the <S%H2022>mountains:<s%> and the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%> <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H5921>by<s%> the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> and <S%H5921>by<s%> the <S%H3027>coast<s%> of <S%H3383>Jordan.<s%>

And <S%H3612>Caleb<s%> <S%H2013>stilled<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H413>before<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> Let us go up at <S%H5927>once,<s%> <S%H5927><s%> and <S%H3423>possess<s%> it; <S%H3588>for<s%> we are well <S%H3201>able<s%> to <S%H3201>overcome<s%> it.

But the <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> him <S%H559>said,<s%> We be not <S%H3201>able<s%> <S%H3808><s%> to go <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> the <S%H5971>people;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H1931>they<s%> are <S%H2389>stronger<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> we.

And they brought <S%H3318>up<s%> an evil <S%H1681>report<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> they had <S%H8446>searched<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> The <S%H776>land,<s%> through <S%H834>which<s%> we have <S%H5674>gone<s%> to <S%H8446>search<s%> it, is a <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H1931>that<s%> eateth <S%H398>up<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> thereof; and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> we <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H8432>in<s%> it are <S%H376>men<s%> of a great <S%H4060>stature.<s%>

And <S%H8033>there<s%> we <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5303>giants,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6061>Anak,<s%> which come <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H5303>giants:<s%> and we <S%H1961>were<s%> in our own <S%H5869>sight<s%> as <S%H2284>grasshoppers,<s%> and <S%H3651>so<s%> we <S%H1961>were<s%> in their <S%H5869>sight.<s%>
